Class XmlResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.resource.BaseResourceLoader
      • br.com.concepting.framework.resource.XmlResourceLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuditorResourceLoader, ContextResourceLoader, FactoryResourceLoader, NetworkResourceLoader, PersistenceResourceLoader, SecurityResourceLoader, SystemResourceLoader

    public abstract class XmlResourceLoader
extends BaseResourceLoader
    Classe que define a estrutura básica para leitura/manipulação de arquivos de configurações no formato XML.

    1.0
    Author:
